issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add support for aliased logical plans
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10718](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10718). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need to support aliasing logical plans so that we can support SQL joins.
